sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import {userInfo} from "../../interfaces/interface"; const MyPage = () => { const User: userInfo = { userphoto: "https://sun6-21.userapi.com/s/v1/ig2/k0PzyoIMKN4XwcNOZ85ncawCKc7DMMoaBXrgoB8gnR000sWP1sQnWmnoLNwQsTP7mKQhragvDcBfJOz6Ldtu7V5p.jpg?size=200x0&quality=96&crop=0,0,768,1080&ava=1", name: "Evgeniy", about: "bark", surname: "Kokaiko", city: "Uzhgorod", country: "Ukraine", friends: 200, subscribers: 500, photos: 136, videos: 151, uid: 1, isAdmin: true, } const posts = [ {id: 1, value: "Hello World", date:"Today" } ] const InfoChanger = () => { return ( <> ) } const AddPost = () => { const random = Math.random() posts.push({id:random, value: postVal, date: DateParser()}) setRerender(prev => !prev) console.log(User.posts) } const RenderPosts = () => { console.log(User.posts) return User.posts.map(el => { return (
{User.name}{User.surname}
{el.date}
{el.value}
) }) } const DateParser = () => { let dateObj = new Date(); let month = dateObj.getUTCMonth() + 1; let day = dateObj.getUTCDate(); let year = dateObj.getUTCFullYear(); let newdate: string = year + "/" + month + "/" + day; return newdate } const [rerender, setRerender] = useState(false) const [postVal, setPostVal] = useState("") return (

{User.name} {User.surname}

Thinks: {User.about}

{InfoChanger()}

My city: {User.city}

My country: {User.country}

{setPostVal(e.target.value)}} placeholder="Write something..." />
{RenderPosts()}
) } export default MyPage
